definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)

sentences.english: All of the cow mountain say that the felloe veins is very clear.
sentences.chinese: 牛山全說，車輪的紋路很清楚。

sentences.english: Fine lines on the palm mean you think clearly and rationally.
sentences.chinese: 手掌紋路清晰的人，代表着思考清楚而理性。

sentences.english: The needle has jumped several grooves.
The master en suite, in gray veined white marble, is luxury defined.
sentences.chinese: 主臥衛生間用大面積灰色紋路的白色大理石定義奢華。

sentences.english: The product feels smooth and light on my face, fills in lines and give a flawless finish.
sentences.chinese: 它觸感光滑，上臉通透，填充紋路給我無瑕疵的妝效。

sentences.english: Workers need to match pairs and size No. due to the different grains.
sentences.chinese: 由於資材紋路粗細不一致，需要配雙並對號裁斷。

sentences.english: After finding the grain we are ready to begin.
sentences.chinese: 找出紙的紋路後就可以開始製作了。

sentences.english: Palmistry claims to know one's future by examining the lines on the palm of one's hand.
sentences.chinese: 看手相的通過觀看手掌的形狀和紋路爲人卜卦。

sentences.english: Scratches or abrasions which remove texture are not acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 會磨去紋路的刮傷或磨損不可允收。

sentences.english: The stylus is traveling in a groove.
sentences.chinese: 唱針正循着唱片紋路移動。

sentences.english: It has the general jade wings, neck, white lines is very clear.
sentences.chinese: 它有翠玉一般的翅膀，頸部的白色紋路很清晰。

sentences.english: It was as if we were driving through the wrinkles of God's hands.
sentences.chinese: 我們就好像正在沿着上帝手掌上的紋路在駕車行駛。

sentences.english: There are grooved places for your feet on either side of the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 在蹲廁兩側會有那種帶紋路的地方是供你的腳踩的。

sentences.english: His brown face was seamed with sorrow .
sentences.chinese: 他那褐色的臉因憂愁而有一條一條紋路。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
